text: Dante John Calabria (born November 8, 1973) is an Italian-American former professional basketball player and coach. He is currently an assistant coach at Barry University. ==College career== Calabria played college basketball at North Carolina under coach Dean Smith from 1992 to 1996. He was a member of the Tar Heels’ 1993 national championship team. ==Professional career== He moved to Europe for his professional career, spending a good part of it in the Italian Serie A. ==International career== A dual national of United States and Italy, he played for the Italy national basketball team. ==Coaching career== In 2011, Calabria was named director of basketball operations at UNC Wilmington under coach Buzz Peterson. In 2012, he was moved to a full assistant role with the departure of Brooks Lee. In June 2018, Calabria became an assistant coach of Larry Brown for the Italian basketball club Auxilium Torino. == References == == External links == * Serie A profile Retrieved 11 August 2015 * UNCW coaching bio Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:American expatriate basketball people in France Category:American expatriate basketball people in Greece Category:American expatriate basketball people in Italy Category:American expatriate basketball people in Spain Category:American men's basketball players Category:Aris B.C. players Category:Barry Buccaneers men's basketball coaches Category:Basket Livorno players Category:Basketball players at the 1993 NCAA Men's Division I Final Four Category:Basketball players at the 1995 NCAA Men's Division I Final Four Category:Basketball players from Pennsylvania Category:Élan Béarnais players Category:Fort Wayne Fury players Category:Fortitudo Pallacanestro Bologna players Category:Italian men's basketball players Category:JDA Dijon Basket players Category:Lega Basket Serie A players Category:Liga ACB players Category:North Carolina Tar Heels men's basketball players Category:Olimpia Milano players Category:Pallacanestro Cantù players Category:Pallacanestro Treviso players Category:Pallacanestro Trieste players Category:Shooting guards Category:UNC Wilmington Seahawks men's basketball coaches Category:Valencia Basket players Category:Vanoli Cremona players
